verses.text: \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* king, unto all \w the|strong="H5020"\w* peoples, nations, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* languages, \w that|strong="H1965"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H1965"\w* all \w the|strong="H5020"\w* earth; peace \w be|strong="H1934"\w* multiplied unto you.

\w It|strong="H5922"\w* hath seemed good \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w me|strong="H5922"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* shew \w the|strong="H5922"\w* signs \w and|strong="H1763"\w* wonders \w that|strong="H1763"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Most High God hath wrought \w toward|strong="H5922"\w* \w me|strong="H5922"\w*.

How great \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w his|strong="H4481"\w* signs! \w and|strong="H2493"\w* how mighty \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w his|strong="H4481"\w* wonders! \w his|strong="H4481"\w* kingdom \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w an|strong="H3606"\w* everlasting kingdom, \w and|strong="H2493"\w* \w his|strong="H4481"\w* dominion \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* generation \w to|strong="H2942"\w* generation.
I Nebuchadnezzar was at rest \w in|strong="H5954"\w* mine house, \w and|strong="H2493"\w* flourishing \w in|strong="H5954"\w* my palace.

\w I|strong="H1768"\w* saw \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* made \w me|strong="H6925"\w* afraid; \w the|strong="H6925"\w* thoughts upon \w my|strong="H1768"\w* bed \w and|strong="H2493"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* visions \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* head troubled \w me|strong="H6925"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3606"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* decree \w to|strong="H3046"\w* bring \w in|strong="H7229"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* wise men \w of|strong="H1768"\w* Babylon before me, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* might \w make|strong="H3046"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* unto me \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*.

Then came \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* magicians, \w the|strong="H5922"\w* enchanters, \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Chaldeans, \w and|strong="H1934"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* soothsayers: \w and|strong="H1934"\w* I told \w the|strong="H5922"\w* dream \w before|strong="H5922"\w* \w them|strong="H5922"\w*; but they \w did|strong="H1934"\w* not make \w known|strong="H1934"\w* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w me|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* interpretation \w thereof|strong="H7314"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3606"\w* at \w the|strong="H3606"\w* last Daniel \w came|strong="H4291"\w* \w in|strong="H8631"\w* before me, \w whose|strong="H3606"\w* name \w was|strong="H3606"\w* Belteshazzar, according \w to|strong="H8065"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* name \w of|strong="H5491"\w* my god, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w in|strong="H8631"\w* whom \w is|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* spirit \w of|strong="H5491"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* holy gods: \w and|strong="H8065"\w* I told \w the|strong="H3606"\w* dream before him, \add saying\add*,

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* Belteshazzar, master \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* magicians, \w because|strong="H4481"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* know \w that|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* spirit \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* holy gods \w is|strong="H3606"\w* \w in|strong="H1753"\w* \w thee|strong="H4481"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w no|strong="H3606"\w* secret troubleth \w thee|strong="H4481"\w*, tell \w me|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* visions \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w my|strong="H4481"\w* dream \w that|strong="H3606"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* have seen, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* interpretation \w thereof|strong="H6074"\w*.

Thus \w were|strong="H1934"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w visions|strong="H2376"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w my|strong="H5922"\w* \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* \w my|strong="H5922"\w* \w bed|strong="H4903"\w*: \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* behold \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tree \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* midst \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* height thereof \w was|strong="H1934"\w* great.

\w The|strong="H4481"\w* tree grew, \w and|strong="H3652"\w* \w was|strong="H2423"\w* strong, \w and|strong="H3652"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* height \w thereof|strong="H6074"\w* reached \w unto|strong="H3652"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H3652"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* sight \w thereof|strong="H6074"\w* \w to|strong="H2429"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* end \w of|strong="H4481"\w* all \w the|strong="H4481"\w* earth.

\w The|strong="H1768"\w* leaves thereof \w were|strong="H1768"\w* fair, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* fruit thereof much, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w in|strong="H2508"\w* it \w was|strong="H2423"\w* meat \w for|strong="H1768"\w* all: \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* \w of|strong="H2920"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w field|strong="H1251"\w* \w had|strong="H1768"\w* shadow under it, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* fowls \w of|strong="H2920"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* dwelt \w in|strong="H2508"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* branches thereof, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* all flesh \w was|strong="H2423"\w* fed \w of|strong="H2920"\w* it.

\w I|strong="H4481"\w* saw \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* visions \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w my|strong="H5922"\w* head \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* \w my|strong="H5922"\w* bed, \w and|strong="H5732"\w*, behold, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* watcher \w and|strong="H5732"\w* an holy one \w came|strong="H2423"\w* down \w from|strong="H4481"\w* heaven.

\w He|strong="H1768"\w* cried aloud, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* said thus, Hew down \w the|strong="H5922"\w* tree, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* cut off \w his|strong="H5922"\w* branches, shake off \w his|strong="H5922"\w* leaves, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* scatter \w his|strong="H5922"\w* fruit: let \w the|strong="H5922"\w* beasts get away \w from|strong="H1768"\w* under \w it|strong="H5922"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* fowls \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* branches.

Nevertheless leave \w the|strong="H3606"\w* stump \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w his|strong="H3046"\w* roots \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* earth, \w even|strong="H1768"\w* \w with|strong="H6903"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* band \w of|strong="H4437"\w* iron \w and|strong="H4430"\w* brass, \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* tender grass \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* field; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* let it \w be|strong="H3809"\w* wet \w with|strong="H6903"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* dew \w of|strong="H4437"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* let \w his|strong="H3046"\w* portion \w be|strong="H3809"\w* \w with|strong="H6903"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* beasts \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* grass \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* earth:

let \w his|strong="H1768"\w* heart \w be|strong="H8160"\w* changed \w from|strong="H1768"\w* man’s \w and|strong="H6032"\w* let \w a|strong="H3068"\w* beast’s heart \w be|strong="H8160"\w* given \w unto|strong="H6032"\w* him; \w and|strong="H6032"\w* let \w seven|strong="H2298"\w* \w times|strong="H2298"\w* pass over him.

\w The|strong="H3606"\w* sentence \w is|strong="H1768"\w* by \w the|strong="H3606"\w* decree \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* watchers, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* demand by \w the|strong="H3606"\w* word \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* holy ones: \w to|strong="H8065"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* intent \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* living may know \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Most High ruleth \w in|strong="H8631"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H1768"\w* men, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* giveth it \w to|strong="H8065"\w* whomsoever \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* setteth up over it \w the|strong="H3606"\w* lowest \w of|strong="H1768"\w* men.

\w This|strong="H3606"\w* dream I king Nebuchadnezzar have seen: \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w thou|strong="H3606"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Belteshazzar, declare \w the|strong="H3606"\w* interpretation, \w forasmuch|strong="H3606"\w* \w as|strong="H3606"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* wise men \w of|strong="H3606"\w* my kingdom are not able \w to|strong="H8065"\w* make known \w unto|strong="H8065"\w* me \w the|strong="H3606"\w* interpretation; \w but|strong="H3606"\w* \w thou|strong="H3606"\w* art able, \w for|strong="H4203"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* spirit \w of|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* holy gods \w is|strong="H3606"\w* \w in|strong="H1753"\w* thee.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* Daniel, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* name \w was|strong="H4430"\w* Belteshazzar, \w was|strong="H4430"\w* astonied \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* while, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* thoughts troubled him. \w The|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* answered \w and|strong="H4430"\w* said, Belteshazzar, let not \w the|strong="H1768"\w* dream \w or|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* interpretation, trouble thee. Belteshazzar answered \w and|strong="H4430"\w* said, \w My|strong="H4430"\w* lord, \w the|strong="H1768"\w* dream be \w to|strong="H4430"\w* them \w that|strong="H1768"\w* hate thee, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* interpretation thereof \w to|strong="H4430"\w* thine adversaries.

\w The|strong="H5922"\w* tree \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w thou|strong="H5705"\w* \w sawest|strong="H2370"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* grew, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* strong, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* height reached \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* sight thereof \w to|strong="H5922"\w* all \w the|strong="H5922"\w* earth;

\w whose|strong="H1768"\w* leaves \w were|strong="H1768"\w* fair, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* fruit \w thereof|strong="H6591"\w* much, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* meat \w for|strong="H5922"\w* all; under \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* field dwelt, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* branches \w the|strong="H5922"\w* fowls \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* heaven \w had|strong="H4430"\w* their habitation:

\w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w thou|strong="H5705"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* king, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* art grown \w and|strong="H4437"\w* become strong: \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w thy|strong="H5922"\w* greatness \w is|strong="H1768"\w* grown, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* reacheth \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w thy|strong="H5922"\w* dominion \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* end \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* earth.

\w And|strong="H4437"\w* \w whereas|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* king saw \w a|strong="H3068"\w* watcher \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w an|strong="H4437"\w* holy one coming down \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* saying, Hew down \w the|strong="H4481"\w* tree, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* destroy \w it|strong="H4481"\w*; nevertheless \w leave|strong="H7662"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w stump|strong="H6136"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w roots|strong="H8330"\w* thereof \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* earth, \w even|strong="H1768"\w* with \w a|strong="H3068"\w* band \w of|strong="H4481"\w* iron \w and|strong="H4437"\w* brass, \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* tender grass \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* field; \w and|strong="H4437"\w* let \w it|strong="H4481"\w* be wet with \w the|strong="H4481"\w* dew \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* let \w his|strong="H4481"\w* portion be with \w the|strong="H4481"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* field, till seven times pass \w over|strong="H7990"\w* \w him|strong="H4481"\w*;

\w this|strong="H5922"\w* is \w the|strong="H5922"\w* interpretation, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* is \w the|strong="H5922"\w* decree \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Most High, which is come \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* \w my|strong="H5922"\w* lord \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*:

\w that|strong="H3606"\w* \w thou|strong="H3606"\w* shalt be driven from men, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w thy|strong="H5922"\w* dwelling \w shall|strong="H3606"\w* be \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* field, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w thou|strong="H3606"\w* shalt be made \w to|strong="H5922"\w* eat grass \w as|strong="H3606"\w* oxen, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* shalt be wet \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* dew \w of|strong="H4430"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* seven times \w shall|strong="H3606"\w* pass \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w thee|strong="H5922"\w*; till \w thou|strong="H3606"\w* know \w that|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Most High ruleth \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H4430"\w* men, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* giveth \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* whomsoever \w he|strong="H5020"\w* \w will|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4437"\w* \w whereas|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* commanded \w to|strong="H5922"\w* leave \w the|strong="H5922"\w* stump \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* tree roots; \w thy|strong="H5922"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w shall|strong="H4437"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* sure \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w thee|strong="H5922"\w*, \w after|strong="H7118"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w thou|strong="H1768"\w* shalt \w have|strong="H1934"\w* \w known|strong="H1934"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* heavens \w do|strong="H5922"\w* rule.

Wherefore, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, let \w my|strong="H4430"\w* counsel \w be|strong="H3809"\w* acceptable \w unto|strong="H6032"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* break off \w thy|strong="H3809"\w* sins by righteousness, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* thine iniquities by shewing mercy \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* poor; if \w there|strong="H1768"\w* may \w be|strong="H3809"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lengthening \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w thy|strong="H3809"\w* tranquillity.
All \w this|strong="H4481"\w* \w came|strong="H5020"\w* \w upon|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*.

\w At|strong="H5705"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* end \w of|strong="H4481"\w* twelve months \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H2423"\w* walking \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w royal|strong="H4437"\w* palace \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Babylon.

\w The|strong="H5922"\w* king spake \w and|strong="H8065"\w* said, \w Is|strong="H1768"\w* not \w this|strong="H5922"\w* \w great|strong="H7236"\w* Babylon, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w have|strong="H5020"\w* built \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* royal dwelling place, \w by|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* might \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w my|strong="H5922"\w* power \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* glory \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w my|strong="H5922"\w* majesty?

While \w the|strong="H5922"\w* word \w was|strong="H7985"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* king’s mouth, \w there|strong="H1768"\w* fell \w a|strong="H3068"\w* voice \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* king \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w thee|strong="H5922"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* spoken: \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* departed \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w thee|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w thou|strong="H3606"\w* shalt \w be|strong="H3809"\w* driven \w from|strong="H1768"\w* men, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w thy|strong="H3809"\w* dwelling \w shall|strong="H4101"\w* \w be|strong="H3809"\w* \w with|strong="H5648"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* field; \w thou|strong="H3606"\w* shalt \w be|strong="H3809"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w* \w to|strong="H2429"\w* eat grass \w as|strong="H3606"\w* oxen, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* seven times \w shall|strong="H4101"\w* \w pass|strong="H3809"\w* over thee; until \w thou|strong="H3606"\w* know \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w Most|strong="H2429"\w* High ruleth \w in|strong="H1753"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H1768"\w* men, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* giveth it \w to|strong="H2429"\w* whomsoever \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H6634"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5922"\w* same hour \w was|strong="H7238"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* thing fulfilled \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* Nebuchadnezzar: \w and|strong="H4437"\w* he \w was|strong="H7238"\w* driven \w from|strong="H3367"\w* \w men|strong="H4437"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* did eat grass \w as|strong="H4437"\w* oxen, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* body \w was|strong="H7238"\w* wet \w with|strong="H8421"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* dew \w of|strong="H4437"\w* heaven, till \w his|strong="H5922"\w* hair \w was|strong="H7238"\w* grown like eagles’ \add feathers\add*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* nails like birds’ \add claws\add*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* at \w the|strong="H3606"\w* end \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* days \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5020"\w* \w up|strong="H7313"\w* mine eyes \w unto|strong="H8065"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* mine understanding returned \w unto|strong="H8065"\w* me, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* blessed \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Most High, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w praised|strong="H7624"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w honoured|strong="H1922"\w* him \w that|strong="H1768"\w* liveth \w for|strong="H1768"\w* ever; \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* dominion \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w an|strong="H4430"\w* everlasting dominion, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* kingdom \w from|strong="H1768"\w* generation \w to|strong="H3202"\w* generation:

And all the inhabitants of the earth are reputed as nothing: and he doeth according to his will in the army of heaven, and among the inhabitants of the earth: and none can stay his hand, or say unto him, What doest thou?

At the same time mine understanding returned unto me; and for the glory of my kingdom, my majesty and brightness returned unto me; and my counsellors and my lords sought unto me; and I was established in my kingdom, and excellent greatness was added unto me.
Now I Nebuchadnezzar praise and extol and honour the King of heaven; for all his works are truth, and his ways judgment: and those that walk in pride he is able to abase.
